column5: What did you do last night, Daisy?
Did you see the film about pirates?
Which was your favourite pirate in the film?
I heard Ben Bluebeard was your favourite pirate in the film. Was he the one with long, curly hair?
I like films which are funny.
How about going to see ‘Treasure Train’ at the cinema? That’s very funny.
Let’s ask Fred to go with us to the cinema!
